mapper.insert: insert into tbl_menu_role (role_group_no, menu_no, reg_user, reg_date, mod_user, mod_date) VALUES (#{roleGroupNo}, #{menuNo}, #{regUser}, #{regDate}, #{modUser}, #{modDate})
mapper.delete: delete from tbl_menu_role where role_group_no = #{roleGroupNo} and menu_no in (with recursive menuAll as (select m1.menu_name, m1.menu_no, m1.upper_menu_no from tbl_menu m1 where m1.menu_code = #{moduleCode} union all select m3.menu_name, m3.menu_no, m3.upper_menu_no from menuAll m2 join tbl_menu m3 on m3.upper_menu_no = m2.menu_no) select ma.menu_no from menuAll ma)
